forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 19C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 67F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low 49F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High near 65F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 47F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 17C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 63F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning with some clearing in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 51F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 62F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 62F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
